entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries near noon then 60 percent chance of rain showers early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023
